name: 9-patch
description: Create resizable boxes with an image border by splitting an image in to nine tiles.

conditions.name: On image URL loaded
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load image from URL' when the image has finished loading.

conditions.name: On image URL failed
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Load image from URL' if the image fails to load.
conditions.display_text: On image URL failed to load

actions.name: Set blend mode
actions.description: Set the background blend mode for this object.

params.name: Blend mode
params.description: Choose the new blend mode for this object.

actions.name: Set margins
actions.description: Set the image margin sizes in pixels.

params.name: Left margin
params.description: The left margin size in pixels.

params.name: Right margin
params.description: The right margin size in pixels.

params.name: Top margin
params.description: The top margin size in pixels.

params.name: Bottom margin
params.description: The bottom margin size in pixels.

actions.name: Set edges
actions.description: Set the style of the 9-patch edges.

params.name: Edges
params.description: Choose whether to tile or stretch the edges.

actions.name: Set fill
actions.description: Set the style of the 9-patch fill.

params.name: Fill
params.description: Choose how to display the inside of the box.

actions.name: Set image X scale
actions.description: Set the X scale of the image within the object.

params.name: X scale
params.description: The X scale of the image within the object, as a percentage.

actions.name: Set image Y scale
actions.description: Set the Y scale of the image within the object.

params.name: Y scale
params.description: The Y scale of the image within the object, as a percentage.

params.name: Seams
params.description: Overlap seams or meet exact. 'Overlap' is seamless unless opacity used.

actions.name: Load image from URL
actions.description: Load an image from a web address or data URI.

params.name: URI
params.description: Enter the URL on the web, or data URI, of an image to load.

expressions.name: LeftMargin
expressions.description: Left border margin on the image in pixels.

expressions.name: RightMargin
expressions.description: Right border margin on the image in pixels.

expressions.description: Top border margin on the image in pixels.

expressions.name: BottomMargin
expressions.description: Bottom border margin on the image in pixels.

expressions.name: ImageScaleX
expressions.description: The X scale of the image within the object.

expressions.name: ImageScaleY
expressions.description: The Y scale of the image within the object.
